thread.title: Live Updates: Man Shot By Police Outside Parliament According To Reports - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: Live Updates: Man Shot By Police Outside Parliament According To Reports - BuzzFeed News

author: Patrick Smith, Jim Waterson
title: Live Updates: Man Shot By Police Outside Parliament According To Reports - BuzzFeed News
text:
Parliament Square is being closed and cleared, with an emergency helicopter parked in the middle of the area. Emergency services are attempting to revive one individual lying down on the pavement on Parliament Street, some way away from the entrance to the building.
Approximately a dozen armed police ran into the building shortly after 3pm.
—Jim Waterson 
ID: 10748756 Picture agency images published shortly after the incident showed a heavy armed police presence outside the Palace of Westminster. View this image › 
Daniel Leal-olivas / AFP / Getty Images 
ID: 10748590   
There's been a shooting / stabbing at Parliament. Stay safe everyone.
— Luke Steele (@Lukesteele4) ID: 10748459 We were called at approx 2:40pm to reports of an incident at #Westminster Bridge. Being treated as a firearms incident - police on scene
— Metropolitan Police (@metpoliceuk) ID: 10748466 Shots fired outside Parliament. Loud explosion then shooting. Man lying shot outside gates to Parliament. Gun shots outside, Frightening.
— Christopher Hope (@christopherhope) ID: 10748467 Scene outside Parliament
— Nick Eardley (@nickeardleybbc) ID: 10748474 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
